channel.title: Spiderman 3 on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Spiderman 3 on Game6r

item.title: Spider Fly
item.description: The beautiful Mary Jane has been kidnapped by a villain and Peter needs to rescue her urgently! Control Spider-Man who moves on the rooftops and help him cope with all the obstacles. On the way there will be opponents that must be avoided, otherwise they will attack the superhero and prevent him from going further.

item.title: Spidey Swing
item.description: The well-known Spiderman is back in action! Spiderman 3 game invites you to help the superhero. You find yourself in a city full of villains who need to be dealt with using the web. Enemies will appear on the screen, and you just have to react in time and shoot at them. Each successful hit brings bonus points. Their number is displayed at the bottom of the screen. But it is important to be careful, because from time to time, Peter Parker’s beloved Mary Jane may appear on the screen.
